00226 // ========================================================================
00227 //                                      Implementation of inlined methods =
00228 
00229 inline OldNode* 
00230 OldRouteableItem::getNode(int i) 
00231 {
00232    if (i == 0) {
00233       return (m_node0);
00234    } else if (i == 1) {
00235       return (m_node1);
00236    } else {
00237       return (NULL);
00238    }
00239 }
00240 
00241 inline const OldNode* 
00242 OldRouteableItem::getNode(int i) const
00243 {
00244    if ( i == 0 )
00245       return m_node0;
00246    else if ( i == 1 )
00247       return m_node1;
00248 
00249    return NULL;
00250 }
00251 
00252 inline OldNode* 
00253 OldRouteableItem::getNodeFromID(uint32 id) 
00254 {
00255    if ( (id & 0x80000000) == 0x80000000) {
00256       return (m_node1);
00257    } else {
00258       return (m_node0);
00259    }
00260 }
00261 
00262 inline byte 
00263 OldRouteableItem::getRoadClass() const 
00264 {
00265    // Should be overridden by subclasses having roadclass.
00266    mc2log << warn << here << " OldRouteableItem::getRoadClass() called." 
00267           << endl;
00268    return (ItemTypes::mainRoad);
00269 }
